body:
rin is best
alp is god

It's not rape or anything, it's just... hardcore sex, which I find pretty sexy. Now, I can't read Japanese, so I don't know if Rin wanted it or not, but it doesn't look like she hated it or anything. There's a big difference between unwanted sex and simple hardcore. I find this doujin really sexy and good, as expexted from Alp.

Some of us just like some good ol' one on one, passionate anal (about time Rin got it in the butt), and it looks like this gives us that. Don't even need the omake, but it's a nice bonus, so I'll look forward when this gets TL-ed. I hope Alp keeps continuing this series.
To express better what I'm trying to say, I nutted harder and faster with the 8-pages-long extra than with the fully written 28-pages-long so-called masterpiece.

Your art is still good tier so I can't b really say that it's bad, but this is way inferior to Takami's and Watanabe's Day Off, fuck even SECRET FAN MEETING has better vanilla without even being.
I highly doubt that more than 5 or 10 sickfucks would miss that old ER where our beloved idols where getting drugged until loosing consciousness and having hurtful, unwished sex, instead of yawning after a 3-hours session of passionated, consensual sex that both enjoys to the maximum, something that you capped with your last one, you could have stopped uploading there, and would have ended up with a professional-tier legacy (Which is not something I want, of course, but just saying that you did such wonderful work there that you could have leaved there without any disappointment from us xD). Now, this is not good, at all.
Alp strikes again. This is it chief.
alp just blessed us with another masterpiece
This just can't be sexier
I don't care if it's vanilla, ntr or rape, I can't shit talk anything from Rin
What a masterpiece, can´t wait for translation.
ok alp has topped himself. fuck.
Good bless Alp-sama, forever and ever
yes we need rape. ahhh no cameeeee
I swear alp is just getting better and better

OH BOY! ALP CAME BACK.
Man, im just so damm happy and hyped rigth now. And i dont even read it already. God, waht a time to still living.
Thank you based alp
Nice, no cursed tags
I'm not really a Rin fan, but that Kanan/not!Honoka omake was good shit. Imo sometimes less rendered and rough looks better than full render.

*sigh* Alps old rape/mind break days are never coming back are they :/ I can’t whole heartedly call any of his new works “bad” because his art is still god tier. But man do I miss his older days where things weren’t just pure vanilla. Always a shame when an artist  goes from slightly darker tags to pure vanilla in my book. (Especially when it’s with a shit tier girl like Rin)
Ringoya the KING has returned
